title: blue Snow
author: blue Snow
content: Since this thread didn't moderate again by Akiko after he got the red tag, I will continue to list Exchangeable Bounty Campaign here. Feel free to drop your information and I will moderate this thread to provide useful information.1. Open - $60K WORTH of ETH REWARD FUND üî¥üî•üî•INCUBATEX LAUNCHPAD BOUNTY- Pool $60K Worth with ETH- 7 weeks bounty campaign, begin in 23rd may until july.- Social Media and Signature Campaign.* disclaimer, I won't be part of any bounty campaign, I just share the information, if you want to join in any campaign please do the research yourself at your own risk.

I want to add a new bounty here.Bounty: Seasonal TokensManager: CryptopreneurBrainbossDuration: 5 weeksPool: $5000 BTC, Escrow. Campaign type: Twiiter 70%, Signature 30%.

comments.author: Cornia
comments.body: Quote from: blue Snow on June 19, 2022, 04:32:56 AM2. [ETH AIRDROP] BRUNOWALLET [LIMITED!]üî•üî¥üü£üü†üü°üî¥üî•- there is too many listed about this on the bounty board, I.m not sure about this, - they giveaway 0.01 ETH creating an account on brunowallet, I don't check if this trueI have joined many such airdrop but have never received any payment. So now these seem to be nothing more than false assurances. Through these they only create accounts from users. So we should not waste time for these.

comments.author: 0verseer
comments.body: Can you give a link to where it was exchangeable for INCUBATEX as well for future exchangeable bounty campaign mention in this thread? I tried to navigate thru INCUBATEX's thread but still can't find it. It also helps people check its price to decide if it was worth joining the bounty campaign.

comments.author: Cornia
comments.body: Quote from: 0verseer on June 19, 2022, 04:32:01 PMCan you give a link to where it was exchangeable for INCUBATEX as well for future exchangeable bounty campaign mention in this thread?The payment for INCUBATEX bounty is Ethereum and the duration of the campaign is 7 weeks. You must know that Ethereum is exchangeable to all of the crypto exchanges. You can know about it by reading first few lines of the bounty thread.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: it is a good deed that someone from our members are willing to take time helping co members finding worth joining bounties , though this is not assuring anyone to make insignificant profit ? yet this is a good act for helping the community .I will be taking my chances also here as I have plenty of time to spend these days because of office adjustment period .thank you Mate.

comments.author: 0verseer
comments.body: Quote from: Cornia on June 20, 2022, 07:17:06 AMQuote from: 0verseer on June 19, 2022, 04:32:01 PMCan you give a link to where it was exchangeable for INCUBATEX as well for future exchangeable bounty campaign mention in this thread?The payment for INCUBATEX bounty is Ethereum and the duration of the campaign is 7 weeks. You must know that Ethereum is exchangeable to all of the crypto exchanges. You can know about it by reading first few lines of the bounty thread.Sorry, I somehow missed that. Weird that they're paying in ETH which is miles better than bounties pay in their own token worth in ETH/BNB but not many bounty hunters join their sign bounty. Only 7 people joined in their sign campaign right now.

comments.author: Cornia
comments.body: Quote from: 0verseer on June 23, 2022, 03:59:12 PMSorry, I somehow missed that. Weird that they're paying in ETH which is miles better than bounties pay in their own token worth in ETH/BNB but not many bounty hunters join their sign bounty. Only 7 people joined in their sign campaign right now.In fact, if the bounty manager is not responsible, the bounty hunters are less interested in joining that bounty. Even after 4/5 weeks of this bounty, no stakes have been updated on the spreedsheet.Sign campaign has always low participants. Because one participant can participate in the only one sign campaign at a time. And that is why no one joins the sign campaign except the bounty of the trusted manager.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: I have hardly pay attentions to bounty, though i can only partake of those that are being managed by a trusted and reliable manager otherwise there are lot of bounty's over there that worth it but before bounty ends token will be worthless and i kept wondering if this was a normal illness¬† concerning bounty campaign nowadays.
